meanings.sent1: She felt nervier than usual before giving her speech.
meanings.sent2: The nervier students volunteered to lead the group project.
meanings.sent3: Despite being nervous, he put on a nervier front to impress his friends.
meanings.sent4: Her nervier attitude in the face of danger inspired those around her.
meanings.sent5: The nervier decision to confront the bully paid off in the end.

meanings.sent1: The nervier choice to climb the mountain without a guide was risky.
meanings.sent2: His nervier fashion sense always turned heads wherever he went.
meanings.sent3: The nervier plan to sneak into the concert without tickets failed miserably.
meanings.sent4: She made a nervier move by quitting her job to pursue her passion.
meanings.sent5: The nervier move of proposing on their first date surprised everyone.

meanings.sent1: The nervier cat hissed at anyone who came too close.
meanings.sent2: He became nervier when the loud music continued late into the night.
meanings.sent3: The nervier reaction to the small mistake made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her nervier response to criticism showed her sensitivity.
meanings.sent5: The nervier driver honked impatiently at the slow-moving car ahead.
